subject: Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Dear Beneficiary,
This is to officially inform you that a payment of 25,000,000.00 GBP
(Twenty Five Million British Pound Sterling) has been approved to be
released to you.
Please acknowledge receipt of this message for more details.
Yours Faithfully,
Mrs.Lindsey Whyte
Director General, International Finance

subject: Re:   Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Dear Whyte,

Thank you for your message. I am intrigued by the prospect of receiving such a substantial sum. Could you please provide more details about this payment? How did it come to be approved for me?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Ruth
